title: #DBtechhackathon 2019 – social media wall
body:
It’s that time of year where once again tech teams from around the world come together to take part in the bank’s flagship 24 hour hackathon.
This year over 1000 people will take part Hackathon making it the bank’s largest so far. Inspired by this year’s theme, “sustainability”, multidisciplinary teams will work around the clock to brainstorm, develop and pitch innovative technology solutions based on five winning ideas chosen by the bank’s employees.
Follow this event on this social media wall and show your support at #dbtechhackathon
